S.FORM: mahica tu. malingatu tu kita.
na tizenga! mibaung!
saydan mahica tu.
na enenga.
mahica tu. ayza a demiad pasubana' ku saydan titaan tu kakanan hicahan nu Sakizaya musakamu.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的撒奇萊雅語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to speak Sechlaiah for food.

S.FORM: matineng mitengil tu kamu nu saydan kisu?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: saydan, caay katineng mitengil kaku. taneng muliyaw aca musakamu?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don't understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: caay pakatengil kaku, satabakien ku ngiha'?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can't hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: na azihen tini! kilulen ku nipiasip aku.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: kapah ku nipiasip.
muliyaw aca. satabakien ku ngiha'.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: satezep han. amana pisakamu.
patahkalen ku cudad.
hang, saydan.
patahkalen ku sapisulit.
saydan, katawalan aku miala ku sapisulit.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: patahkalen ku sabulic.
saydan, makatawal aku miala ku sabulic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: caliwen ku i tepalay a kaput tu sabulic.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: pacaliwen kaku tu sabulic kapah haw?
mihibang tu kita.
hayni tu kita, ayaw tu a lipay masasuazih.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: cima kisu?
ci Kumud kaku.
cima kisu?
u wawa ni Mayaw kaku ci Bukah kaku.
S.TRANSL: I am the son of Mayaw, and my name is Bukah.

S.FORM: cima kisu?
u micudaday ni Kasuy kaku, ci Bukah ku ngangan aku.
S.TRANSL: I am a student in Kasuy, my name is Bukah.

S.FORM: cima ku ngangan nu misu?
ci Angaw ku ngangan aku.
cima ku ngangan ni ama isu?
ci Namuh ku ngangan ni ama aku.
cima ci niza?
ci Mayaw ciniza.
u kaka aku ciniza ci Bakah ku ngangan niza.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Bakah.

S.FORM: cima ku ngangan niza?
ci Ba'tu ku ngangan niza.
ci Kumud ku ngangan niza haw?
hang, ci Kumud ku ngangan niza.
ci Mayaw ku ngangan niza haw?
cayay, ci Kulas ku ngangan niza.
cima kuyza a tademaw?
ci Tipis ciniza. u bai aku ciniza.
cima kuyza a tademaw?
u cabay aku ci niza, ci Siku ku ngangan niza.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Siku。
She is my friend and her name is Siku.

S.FORM: pina ku mihcaan isu?
cacay a bataan ku mihcaan aku ayza.
pina ku mihcaan niza ayza.
sabaw tusa ku mihcaan niza ayza.
pina ku mihcaan ni ama isu ayza.
lima a bataan ku mihcaan ni ama aku ayza.
papina ku calkakaan isu ?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: tatusa ku calakakaan aku, cacay ku sabama sabana.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: izaw ku kakama isu?
nayi' ku kakama aku.
papina ku i luma'ay a tademaw namu.
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: sasepat ku tademaw nu i luma'ay niyam.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: i cuwa micudad kisu?
i Pusung micudad kaku.
cima ci niza?
sinaama aku ciniza.
u canan ku kawawa ni sinaama isu?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: u tayling ciniza.
cima kuyza a tademaw?
u kakana aku ciniza.
musakawaw ku kakana isu?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: i padekuwan musakawaw ciniza.
calkakaan tatusa ku heni haw?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: caay, malcabayay ku heni.
u Yin-cu-min kisu haw?
hang, u Sakizaya kaku.
u Yin-cu-min ku acawa isu?
hang, nika Bunung ciniza.
S.TRANSL: Yes, but she is a Bunun.

S.FORM: talakaw ku ama isu?
hang, talakaw mamin kami.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: micudad tu ku sabana isu?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: hang, micacud tu ciniza.
matineng mihanu binacadan ku sabama sabana isu?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: hang, matineng mihanu binacadan a kamu ku heni.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: papina ku calkakaan isu?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: tatulu ku calkakaan aku.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: mapulung mueneng kisu atu ama ina isu?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: hang, mapulung mueneng kaku atu ama ina.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: mapulung mueneng kisu atu bai baki haw?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: cuwa, caay kapulung mueneng kaku i tuhenian.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: cima ku kapulungan nu misu mueneng ?
mapulung kami a ciama, ina, kakama mueneng.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: namakay cuwaay kisu ?
namay Kalingku kaku.
i cuwa ku luma' namu?
i Pusung ku luma' aku.
i cuwa ku niyazu' isu?
i Takaw ku niyazu' aku.
i cuwa ku niyazu' namu?
i Sakul ku niyazu' niyam.
S.TRANSL: 我們的部落在國福里(撒固兒部落)。

S.FORM: anuyaan a taluma' i niyazu' kisu?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: pihibangan taluma' tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: u Sakizaya a wawa kaku.
mahica ku demiad ayza?
sicilal tu, caledes ku demiad.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: cu'det i hekal?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: sienaw, yadahen ku kasizikuc.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: caledes i hekal?
caay, sibali tu, banihiw.
mahica ku demiad ayza?
ayza a dimiad caay ka caledes caay aca ka cu'det, zahkez sa.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: ayza a demiad mahicaay ku sandeb?
nayi' ku ladem nu tapuku, sibunac tu.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad i hekal?
nasawni masasa' ku udad, sicilal tu, tahkal tu ku bihkaz ni Edek.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad tisuwan?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: tabaki ku bali i tini tamiyanan.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: kapah ku demiad i tisuwan?
kapah, tabaki ku cilal.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: tayza tu i cacudadan kaku.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: cu'det ku demiad, yadahen ku kasizikuc.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: a mumul tu kaku.
anusawni a tabaki ku udad, kasikawswa tu.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: a maudud haw?
makeleng tu nasawni, ansawni a maudad.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: maudad tu haw?
maudad nasawni, masasa' tu ku udad ayza.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: maudad tu haw?
mahiza namaudaday tu, malalemed ku zazan.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: maudad haw? kya malalemed ku uzip isu?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: maudad i hekal, cayay ka sikawswa kaku.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: kapah tu haw kisu?
tabaki ku bali, adada ku tangah aku nabeliwan nu bali.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: kapah tu kisu haw?
tabaki ku cilal, masinawal ku tangah aku mapacilal.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: makatawal kaku tu sapisulit.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: pacaliwen aku kisu.
makatawal kaku tu atip.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: makatawal kaku, micakay kita.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: micakay kita tu sasulitan haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: hang, a micakay henay tu sabulic.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: micakay kita tu sakalanam haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: haycan, na malanamay tu kaku i luma'.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: kapawanan aku mihudhud tu tabu.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: kabili paakuti'en tu!
S.TRANSL: Hurry up and heat it up!

S.FORM: mapawan a sitabu kaku.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: mahiza/mahida sa pulung han ita mukan ku tabu.
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧！
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: u canan ku sakalahuk isu?
S.TRANSL: What do you want to eat for lunch?

S.FORM: i cacudadan kaku mukan tu asu'ay a sakalahuk.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: u canan ku sakalahuk isu?
S.TRANSL: What do you want to eat for lunch?

S.FORM: sitabu kaku ayza a demiad, mapulung kita malahuk!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧！
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: tayza kita mimali kapah tu haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: hang i! natu kita.
tayza kita mipangciw kapah tu haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play baseball, shall we?

S.FORM: kai, a micudad kaku.
na padangen kaku miala tu saasik.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: hang, ya na saasik.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: pataduen kaku miala tu dawa kapah tu haw?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: miasik kaku, kau ci Tubah ku miedapay tisuwanan muala.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Tubah to carry it for you.

S.FORM: mamin tu kisu miasik haw?
mamin tu kaku miasik.
kya caay kisu piasik?
mamin tu kaku.
mauning ku ti-pan, katayza misipu.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: hang, miala kaku tu sasipu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: mauning kuyza a sasingalan, katayza misipu.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: sawni tu, caay henay kaasik aku ku i tiniay.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: a mihica kisu anu sawni?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do later?

S.FORM: tayza mikilim kaku tu saydan.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: namicudad taluma' a mihica kisu?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: a miladay kaku tu cabay tayza mudadiw.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: namicudad taluma' a mihica ciniza?
S.TRANSL: What does he do after school?

S.FORM: a tayza ciniza mingaduy.
hani i luma' ci Puhay haw?
i luma' tu ciniza, na cumuda.
S.TRANSL: She's at home, please come in.

S.FORM: hani i luma' ci Tipus haw?
nayay ciniza, hani u canan ku kawaw isu saw?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事？
She's not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: cima saw?
baki, ci Tipus kaku, wawahen ku panan.
S.TRANSL: Grandfather, I am Tipus, please open the door.

S.FORM: hani cima saw?
Buting, ci Kanasaw kaku, tayni miidang i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Buting, I'm Kanasaw, I've come to play with you.

S.FORM: matenes tu caay kasasuazih.
hang! mabulah tu kaku tisuwan, awza malpadang i!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你，快來聊天吧。
Yeah! I've missed you, come and chat.

S.FORM: na enenga, na pinanum i tu uciya.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: kukay.
na pinanum i tu uciya.
hubaw! asu' nanumen ku uciya namu.
awza mukan tu heci kita i!
hang! uyni a heci asu' sa azihen.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: asu' haw kanen ku heci?
hang, tatenga' asu' kanen.
mamin tu ci ina misakalabi, awza mukan!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: hang, mibanaw tu lima kaku.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: bilil han mukan, caay kau tau kisu.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you're not an outsider.

S.FORM: yadah ku nikanan aku, mabecul tu.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: sayadahen ku nikan, amana kasikaz.
hang, tatenga' asu'.
a miliyas tu kaku, zuma/duma hawtu tayni miazih tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.

S.FORM: hang i, haymaw han tu.
duutan tu, a talumu' tu kaku.
tayni han tu anu ayaw midang i!
pihaymaw i ku culil.
hang i, silawad tayni han tu i luma' aku midang.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: mahica tu, ayza a demiad a ladayen ni saydan kita tayza i niyazu' mizizaw tu kalas.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I'm taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: hang i! mihanu Sakizaya kita tu kalas.
S.TRANSL: 好喔！我們要跟耆老說撒奇萊雅語。

S.FORM: a makatukuh tu kita haw?
a makatukuh tu.
baki, tayni kami miazih tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we've come to see you.

S.FORM: yah matineng kamu mihanu Sakizaya! tatenga' matineng tu!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說撒奇萊雅語啊！真是太棒了！

S.FORM: mahica tu, ayza a demiad a ladayen ni saydan kita mapulung tayza i paluma tu habay maluk.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: hang i, saydan.
katayni misiluc kita, amana katawal miala tu sadikec.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: hang i, saydan, maala tu niyam ku sadikec.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we've got our tools.

S.FORM: makatukuh tu kita haw?
caay henay katukuh, mabatad henay.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it's still far away.

S.FORM: katayza kisu mibasbas.
hang, akuway ku mibasbasay.
katayza kisu miala tu sapibahbah tu ayam.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: hang, akuway ku mibahbahay tu ayam.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: mahica tu, ayza a demiad a tayza kita i aidangan nu aadupan.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: kapah tu! a hicaen ita tayza?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔！我們要怎麼去呢？
Awesome! How are we gonna get there?

S.FORM: u basu ku kacawan nu mita tayza.
kapahen ku nipisiluc, a micakay tu paya kita.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: hang i.
nu ayawan sa u ayaman, nu zikuzan sa nu bauay, kakuniza han kita muazih.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: saydan matalaw kaku tu bau.
a hicanaca, kau isu ku miazihay tu ayam.
S.TRANSL: It doesn't matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: nu zikuzan cacay a tatukian tayni masaupu kita.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We'll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: hang, kukay saydan.
u canan ku nikaazihan isu ayza.
yadah ku nikaazihan aku tu bau atu ayam.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: kabili, a mumul tu kita.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: halhalen kaku, mangelu' ku kuku' aku.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: maladay kita tayza mingaduy kapah haw?
hang i! natu i!
katuud ku tademaw i tini mingaduy.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: i labu ku nanum i tiza, i tini han kita mingaduy.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: hicaen isu tayni?
culil han aku tayni.
u canan ku kacawan isu tayni?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: makabasu kaku tayni.
hicaen isu tayza i kiwkay?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: makazizeng tupinan ni ama tayza kaku.
hicaen niza tayza i cudadan?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: u nulpin ku kacawan niza tayza i cacudadan.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: hicaen ni bai isu tayza micakay tu lami'?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: makautubay ciniza micakay tu lami'.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: a hicaen isu tayza i Butu?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: makabalunga kaku tayza i Butu.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: a hicaen isu tayza i Butu?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: makahikuki tayza i Butu ciniza.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: u canan ku kacawan niza tayza i Takaw?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: siwmalay ku kacawan niza tayza i Takaw.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: u silamalay ku kacawan niza tayza i Pusung?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: hang, u silamala ku kacawan niza tayza i Pusung.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: u silamalay ku kacawan niza tayza i Pusung?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: cayay, u hikuki ku kacawan niza tayza i Pusung.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: izaw ku kakacawan tu basu i capi haw?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: izaw taayaw han maazih tu kakacawan tu basu.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: i cuwa ku macapiay a kakacawan tu nulpin?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: nayi' ku kakacawan tu nulpin i tini, u hayya dada' ku sakacaw isu.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: mikacaw tu basu matenes haw katukuh i cacudadan?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: sabaw lima sasulitan katukuh i cacudadan.
mikacaw tu siwmalay pina a tatukian katukuh i Tayciw?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: cacay a tatukiay makatukuh tu i Tayciw.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: pakazizeng tayza i Ulay matenes haw?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: pakala tu cacay a tatukian.
makanulpin kisu tayni i luma' aku a matenes haw?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: makala tu tusaay a bataan nu sasulitan.
matineng kisu makabalikal haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: matineng makabatikal kaku.
izaw ku utubay isu haw?
izaw ku cacay a utubay aku.
siutubay kisu haw?
nayi' ku utubay aku.
kapah mipalita kaku tisuwan haw?
kapah tu, mahang tu kaku.
taneng kaku mipalita tisuwan haw ?
amana, caay kayadah ku katineng aku.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: namalahuk silawad kisu? maydih mizizaw kaku tisuwan taneng tu?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: hang i, halhalen aku kisu i luma'.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: ancila silawad kisu haw? maydih mipalita kaku tisuwan tu sakay Sakizaya a kungku.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於撒奇萊雅族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I'd like to ask you about the legendary story of the Sakizaya tribe.

S.FORM: a tabuyu' kaku ancila, caay ka i luma'.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: u tengil aku u satinengay tu nu Sakizaya a lisin nu babalaki kisu, madih mipalita tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對撒奇萊雅的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you know a lot about the customs of Sakizaya and would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: caay kayadah ku katinengan aku, nikabilil han tu nu maku mipatubeli.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: hani kapah miliadingu kaku haw? mahiza anayaw kya madayum micilu.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: hang i, nayi' ku sapabaliw.
hani pinaay tu ku mihcaan isu?
siwa bataan izaw ku walu ku mihcaan aku.
masakapahay henay kisu.
i cuwa saw! u balakiay tu kaku.
hani namakay cuwaay kisu?
makay Takubuwan kaku.
hani u Bunung ku acawa isu?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是布農族嗎?
Is your wife also a Bunun?

S.FORM: caay, u Sakizaya ciniza.
pina ku katenengan isu a kamu?
matineng mihanu Sakizaya atu Pangcah a kamu kaku.
S.TRANSL: 我會說撒奇萊雅語和阿美語。

S.FORM: ayza a demiad manamuh mipalita tisuwan, sakamu wamay kisu, sakay miadupay a paysin haw?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: hang i. namasakapah henay kaku hina tabuyu' miadup.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: kukay, ayza kapah kuni pasubana'an isu.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: nakamuwan aku u tatenga'an amin, nakamuwan nu babalaki.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: ayza a demiad hatini tu ku nipalita, kukay kuni pawapen isu.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: amana kasikaz, masasakamu haw tu kita.
a mumul tu kaku, ayaw han tu a matineng tu yadahay a kungku.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: kapah tu! haymaw han tu.
mahica tu, u canan ku cakayen isu?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: a micakay tu cacay a kupu kaku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: mahica tu, u canan ku cakayen isu?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: micakay tu cacay a tupel kaku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: amicakay tu kupu kaku, izaw kina pacakay namu haw?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: izaw, pina ku kaydihan isu micakay?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: izaw kunipacakay namu tu da'dac haw?
nayi', caay pacakay tu da'dac kami.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: micakay kaku tu belac.
pina a tabu kuni picakay isu?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: papelien kaku tu tuluay a tabu.
a micakay tu tubah kaku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: mapacakay tu amin ku tubah.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: micakay tu tusaay a silasumi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: cacay tu ku liwan niyam.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: padaduen kaku micakay tu ti'kuk.
pina a daduy ku picakay isu?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pina a daduy kuni picakay isu tu ti'kuk?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: tusaan a daduy kuni picakay aku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: tusaen a balud ku kenaw picakay aku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: tulu tu a balud ku liwan, hamin han i!
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: pinaan ku aca nina belac?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: tusa a lasubu ku cacay a tabu.
pulung han tusa bataan izaw ku cacay a kalisiw, kapah tu tusa han a bataan.
kukay.
siwa izaw ku lima a kalisiw ku itiniay.
a micakay henay kaku, micunus tu cacay a lasubu nu kalisiw.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: hamin lima a lasubu izaw ku cacay a bataan ku kalisiw.
lima a lasubu han ku aca i takuwan haw?
tada matekes kuyni, taneng selepen tu atudi haw?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: la'cus, u maselepay tu kuyni.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: uyni a piyang ku han aku.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: tulu a bataan ku aca kina piyang, maydih henay tu zumaay a tuud haw?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: taneng kaku micaliw tu kalisiw i tisuwan?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: taneng tu, pina ku kaydihan isu tu kalisiw?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: makatawal muala tu kalisiw kaku, taneng micaliw kaku tu kalisiw i tisuwan haw?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: nayi' aca ku niala aku tu kalisiw!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: makatawal muala tu kalisiw kaku, taneng micaliw kaku tu kalisiw i tisuwawan haw?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: kai', nicaliwan naayaw caay henay kisu panukas i takuwan
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: taneng kaku haw micaliw tu zikuc nu misu?
hang, a u isu tu ku mualaay.
taneng caliwan aku ku cudad isu haw?
mapacaliw tu aku ci Puhayan.
pacaliwen kaku tu batikal isu kapah tu haw?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: hang, nika panukasen kaku anucila.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: maudad tu, nayi' ku niala aku tu cacebalan, pacaliwen kaku tu cacebalan.
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: izaw/idaw ku cacay a cacebalan aku, maladay kita micebal!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: nipacaliwan isu i takuwan a cudad, panukas tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: anu maydih henay miazi tu canan a cudad sakamu han kaku.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: ayaan kaku a panukas tu nicaliwan a kalisiw i tisuwan
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: payawan, anu izaw ku kalisiw isu itawya han tu.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: ayaan kisu panukas tu kalisiw i takuwan?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: panukas han aku ancila kisu.
S.TRANSL: I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: ayaan kisu panukas tu cudad aku?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: namapanukas tu aku nacila i tisuwan?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: nipacaliw ni Buting kuyni a sasulitan?
S.TRANSL: Did Buting lend you this pen?

S.FORM: hang, nicaliwan aku ayza cinizaan/cinidaan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: nicaliwan isu kuyni a sasulitan i ci Kanasawan?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Kanasaw?

S.FORM: caay, nicakayan ni ina kuyni.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: nayi' tu ku cihah, katayza ci Nakawan micaliw.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, so let's go borrow some from Nakaw.

S.FORM: hang, aku ku tayzaay micaliw.
katayza ci Tipusan papanukas tu kalisiw i takuwan.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Tipus to give me my money back.

S.FORM: pina ku pitadah niza i tisuwan saw?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: a tacuwa kisu?
tayza i palamian a paluma tu lami' aku.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: mihica kisu?
yadah ku lutuk, mibulesiw kaku, mibasbas ansawni.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: padaneng kaku muala tu kakawit atu tatak kapah haw?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: i cuwaen isu ku nipazeng?
mapazeng i tapiingan nu sakalut.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: matabiay tu isu haw?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: namatabiay tu aku nasawni, a paluma answni.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: taneng tu haw alaen ku nipalumaan isu a lami'?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: kapah tu alaen ku i tiniay a tamana, kuyzaan a taydung caay han kau a alaen.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: hubaw! kayadah ku nikutkutan isu tu tubah.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: edapen kaku mipazeng i sulu kapah haw?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: mica kamu?
pasalil mibuting kami.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: yadah ku buting i tini?
matumes tu nu buting ku pubu.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: hicaen nu misu mibuting?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: u pacingen ku sapibuting aku.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: matineng kisu acingen miadup haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: u bihekac ku sapiadup aku, alahican muala tu kuwang siniladay tu wacu miadup.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: u nikayzaan nu kiwmah kuyni.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: kya matineng kisu saw?
u nazipaan nu kiwmah kuyni, sisa u kakayzaan nu kiwmah kuyni.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: tayza milidu kita, mahiza u sinikaalaan tu aadupan.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: kya matineng kisu?
mahiza makasanekay kya wacu. kalamkam han tu ita mikilul.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: u canan ku sanga'en isu ayza a tuud?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: nu ba'tuay a sapenec a bihekac kuyni, u sapizakep tu e'du.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: u canan a tuud ku nipazeng isu i tiza?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: u sapilikuku' nu laicay a bihekac kuyza, u sapizakep niyam tu kahiw.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: mikukay tu tuas ku nipadahi, ayza a demiad yadah ku nikaala tu niadupan.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: hang! pataluma'en ita pawapen tu niyazu'ay!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: ayza a pasubana'en nu saydang kita hicahan musakamu nu Sakizaya ku aadupan.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的撒奇萊雅族語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Sakizaya language today.

S.FORM: ayza a pasubana'en nu saydang kita hicahan musakamu nu Sakizaya ku mulangaway.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的撒奇萊雅族語怎麼說。

S.FORM: ayza a pasubana'en nu saydang kita hicahan musakamu nu Sakizaya ku heci.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的撒奇萊雅族語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Sakizaya language today.

S.FORM: amana kabi'.
amana pisakamu.
amana kan tu kakanan.
patahkalen ku cudad nu misu.
patahkalen ku sapisulit nu misu.
patahkalen ku cacudaden nu misu.
singaen ku cudad.
singaen ku sasulitan.
singaen ku kakanan.
singaen ku sasalamaan.
nimaay kuyni a sapisulit?
nu makuay.
nimaay kuyni a cudad?
ni Kilangay.
nimaay kuyni a sabulic?
caay katineng kaku.
ni Ba'tuay a zikuc kuyza?
cayay, ni Sabak a kabung.
saydang cayay kaala ku cudad aku.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn't bring my textbook.

S.FORM: pulung han tu tepalay a kaput miazih.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: mangeli' tu ku sapisulit nu maku.
kau yen-ce-pi ku sapisulit.
mahedaw ku sabulic nu maku.
pacaliwen aku kisu tu sabulic.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: pahanhan tu micudad kataluma'an a zazan/dadan pihaymawi!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: hang. kukay saydang.
pahanhan tu micudad kita, hidaw haw tu.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: saydang haymaw han tu.
mahica tu, ci Abang ku ngangan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Abang.

S.FORM: mahica tu kisu Abang.
mahica tu, ci Kumud ku ngangan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Kumud.

S.FORM: mahica tu Kumud.
mahica tu, ci Abang kaku.
mahica tu Abang, ci Namuh kaku.
mahica tu, ci Namuh kaku.
Namuh mahica tu, ci Kuli kaku.
cima kisu?
ci ina ni Tutuy kaku, ci Iisin kaku.
cima kisu?
u sabana ni Tubah kaku, ci Aing ku ngangan nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 我是Tubah的妹妹，我的名字是Aing。
I am Tubah's sister. My name is Aing.

S.FORM: cima ciniza?
u saydang nu maku ciniza, ci Yiyang ciniza.
cima kuyza a tademaw?
u kakama nu maku ciniza, ci Kasuy ciniza.
ci Bangah ciniza haw?
hang ci Bangah ciniza.
ci Tingki kisu haw?
cayay, ci Ulaw kaku.
cima ci Tali?
ci Tali kaku.
cima ci Putah?
u cabay aku ci Putah.
cima ku ngangan nu kakana isu?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister's name?

S.FORM: ci Miku ku ngangan nu kakana aku.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister's name is Miku.

S.FORM: cima ku ngangan nu sabana isu?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister's name?

S.FORM: ci Kawpil ku ngangan nu sabana aku.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister's name is Kawpil.

S.FORM: matineng kisu tu ngangan niza haw?
ci Buting ciniza.
pina ku mihcaan nu kakama isu saw?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: sabaw lima tu ku mihcaan niza ayza.
pina ku mihcaan nu sabama isu ayza?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: lima tu ku mihcaan niza.
izaw ku cacudadan nu niyazu' namu haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: izaw.
i niyazu'ay a cacudadan micudad kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe's school?

S.FORM: hang, micudad kami i cacudadan mahiza u luma'ay niyam.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: cima kuyza tatama?
u sinaama aku ciniza.
cima kiza tatayna?
u kakana aku ciniza.
cima kiza wawa saw?
u sabama aku ciniza.
u canan ku kawaw ni ina isu?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: u hitay ciniza.
u canan ku kawaw ni ama isu?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: u saydang ciniza.
u sabama isu ciniza haw?
cayay, u cabay nu sabama aku ciniza.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother's friend.

S.FORM: u kakana isu ciniza haw?
cayay, u sabana aku ciniza.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: papina ku luma'ay a tademaw nu heni?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: lalimaay ku tademaw nu luma'ay nuheni.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: papina ku wawa nu luma'ay namu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: sasepatay ku wawa niyam.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: papina ku sabama sabana isu?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: nai' ku sabama aku, tatulu ku sabana aku.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don't have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: papina ku kakana isu?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: nai' ku kakana aku.
S.TRANSL: I don't have any older siblings.

S.FORM: papina ku malkakaay isu?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: nai' ku malkakaay aku.
malkakaay kamu haw?
hang, u kakama aku ciniza.
u Yen-cu-min kamu haw?
hang, u Yen-cu-min kami.
u Sakizaya ciniza haw?
S.TRANSL: 她也是撒奇萊雅族人嗎?

S.FORM: hang, u Sakizaya ciniza.
S.TRANSL: 是的，她也是撒奇萊雅族人。

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad ayza?
sisienawan ku demiad, yadahen ku pinanum tu akuti'ay.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It's a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad ayza?
cacaledesan ku demiad, yadahen ku pinanum.
S.TRANSL: It's a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad i hekal?
tabaki ku cilal, amana pacilal.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad i hekal?
siladem, nai' ku cilal i tapuku.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad ancila?
cayay kasicilal ancila, siladem tabaki ku bali.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad itawya?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: sisienawan ku demiad, kasikabung tahkal.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: mahica ku demiad pilipayan?
S.TRANSL: How's the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: cilalan ku demiad tu pilipayan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: amaudad ku demiad itawya haw?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: cilalan ku demiad itawya, caay ka udad.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: maudad ku demiad itawya haw?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: hang, maudad itawya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: maudad ayza haw?
masasa' tu ku udad, macilal tu.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: maudad ayza haw?
maudad tu, caay kasikawswa kaku.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don't have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: maudad i putah haw?
nayay ku udad ayza, namamin malahuk a maudad, kasikawswa tahkal.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: ancila a mihcaan a sienaw ku kasienawan haw?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: hang, ayaw a mihcaan sienaw ku kasienawan, yadahen ku kasizikuc.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: ayza a mihcaana a caledes ku lalud haw?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: hang, a caledes ku lalud, yadahen ku pinanum.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: manamuh kisu tu sadingsing haw?
manamuh kaku tu sadingsingan, dihku ku demiad.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: manamuh kisu tu balangbangan haw?
caay kanamuh tu balangbangan kaku, sibaliyus ku balangbangan.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don't like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: mapawan tu aku miala ku cudad.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: aku atu isu pulung han miazih.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: mapawan tu aku miala ku sabulic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: pacaliwen aku kisu.
mapawan kisu miala tu sapisulit haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: hang, pacaliwen aku tu sapisulit isu kapah tu haw?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: u canan ku sakalahuk isu?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: u pang ku kanen aku.
u canan ku sakalabi isu?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: u hemay ku kanen aku.
u canan ku sakalanam isu?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: u ti'kuk ku kanen aku.
u canan ku sakalahuk isu?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: u tulakuk ku kanen aku.
tayza mitukud tu mali kita.
ayaw kisu tayza, asawni tu tayza kaku mikilim tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: tayza midanguy kita.
hang i! maladay kita tayza.
tayza kita misalama tu mali.
kai, ayaw milimad tu cudad kita.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: misulac tu ngipen kisu haw?
caay henay, mibanaw tu kaysing kaku.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: miluwalu tu kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: namiluwalu tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: namibanaw tu kaysing kisu haw?
maminay tu mibanaw tu kaysing kaku.
mahica caay pibanaw tu lima kisu?
S.TRANSL: Why didn't you wash your hands?

S.FORM: sawni tu mibanaw kaku.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: namihica kisu nasawni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: tayza kaku mikilim tu saydang.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: pahanhan namicudad a mihica kisu?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: a pabesuc taluma' kaku.
pahanhan namicudad a mihica ciniza?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: a tayza musalukyaw ciniza.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Nakaw, i luma' kisu haw?
tinitu, kapicumud.
Kawpil, i luma' kisu haw?
nayay i luma' ci Kawpil! ci Tamana kaku. sikawaw haw? sakamu hantu nu maku taluma' ci Kawpil.
S.TRANSL: Kawpil不在家耶!我是Tamana，有什麼事嗎?回來我會轉告Kawpil。
Kawpil is not at home. I am Tamana. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: cima kamu saw?
bai, ci Kawpil atu ci Tamana kami, wawahen ku panan!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Kawpil和Tamana，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Kawpil and Tamana, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: cima saw?
ci Kawpil kaku, tayni mikilim ci Utayan.
S.TRANSL: I am Kawpil, I am here for Utayan.

S.FORM: bai, tayni kaku miazih/miadihi i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: matenes tu kisu caay katayni, mabulah tu kaku i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven't been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Tipus, tayni kaku midang i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Tipus, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: kapicumud, matenes tu kaku muhalhal i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: nipalumaan aku kuyni a tubah, kanamay!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: sicedam kina tubah.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: awza! nipalumaan aku a heci kuyni, kanamay.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: sicedam kina heci.
enenga! nipalumaan aku caay ku nisiwdukan a kubkub kanamay!
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: hubaw! kasicedam knina kubkub.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: maydih kisu mukan tu kama haw?
la'cus kaku mukan tu kama, u linggu ku kanen aku.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can't eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: maydih kisu mukan tu piyang haw?
hang, manamuh kaku.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: pudacen aku ku heci pakan i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: kukay, sisalang kina heci.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: kukay.
yadahen ku nikan, yadah ku nisalami'an nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: hubaw! tatenga' bangsis sa asu' aca.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: yadahen ku nikan, yadah henay itini.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: a caay kasikaz/kasikad kaku yu!
S.TRANSL: I'll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: yadahen ku nikan, yadah henay itini.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: yadah tuway ku nikan aku, la'cus tu mukan.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn't eat any more.

S.FORM: ayza a ladayen nu saydang kamu tabuyu'.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: sakamu sa ci ina yadah ku likes i buyu'.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: ayza a ladayen nu saydang kamu taumah.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: a mitabi kita haw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: a tacuwa kita ayza.
a ladayen nu saydang kami tayza i sauwac.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: a tacuwa kita ayza?
a ladayen nu saydang kami tayza/tayda i buyu'.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: a tayza kita ayza i sauwac haw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: caay, a ladayen nu saydang kami tayza/tayda i buyu'.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: a tayza kita ayza i buyu' haw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: caay, a tayza/tayda i umah kami ayza.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: saydang, tayza kita i sauwac u canan ku azihen?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: tayda kita miadih tu beded.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: saydang, tayda i buyu' kita u canan ku adihen?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: tayda kita miadih tu adipapang.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: mihica kita tayda i umah?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: tayda kita i umah miadih tu nipalumaan a kubkub, pihaymawi tu puduh atu wadu!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: saydang a tayda kita i sauwac midanguy haw?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: caay, a miadih/miazih kita tu beded.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: saydang a tayda kita i umah paluma tu lami' haw?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: ayda a tayda/tayza kita mitabi.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: idaw i tida ku beded misabahebahel.
ayda henay kaku makadih tu maudipay a beded.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: i tida idaw ku sabahebahelay a adipapang.
ye! hubaw! manamuh kaku tu adipapang, salungan.
S.TRANSL: 耶!哇!我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: i tida idaw ku sabahebahelay a adipapang.
caay kau adipapang kuyda, u wadu kuyda.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: kaitini tu miazih, amana ka tayda/tayza i baatay a kakitidaan.
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don't go too far!

S.FORM: hang, caay ka tayda/tayza kami i mabaatay.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won't go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: amana ka duba', pihaymawi muculil mapulina.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don't run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: maydih kaku kalamkam sa makaadih.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: hicaen isu tayda i dabek?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: pakadideng kaku tayda i dabek.
hicaen nida tayda/tayza i padekuan?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: culil han nida tayda i padekuan.
hicaen isu tayda i Pung-hu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: makahikuki kaku tayda i Pung-hu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: hicaen isu tayda i Pung-hu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: makabalunga' kaku tayda i Pung-hu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: u canan ku kacawan isu taluma'?
makanulpin kaku taluma'.
u canan ku kacawan ni Panay tayda i cacudadan?
S.TRANSL: How does Panay go to school?

S.FORM: makasilamalay ci Panay tayda i cacudadan.
S.TRANSL: Panay goes to school by train.

S.FORM: u canan ku kacawan ni Tubah tayda i kiwkay?
S.TRANSL: How does Tubah go to church?

S.FORM: makabatikal ci Tubah tayda i kiwkay.
S.TRANSL: Tubah goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: makanulpin kisu tayda i cacudadan haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: caay, makabasu kaku tayda i cacudadan.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: makabatikal kisu tayda i cacudadan haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: hang, makabatikal kaku tayda i cacudadan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: makasiumalay kisu tayza i Takaw haw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: hang, makasiumalay kaku tayda i Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: tayda i Pusung kisu makasilamalay u makahikuki?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: makahikuki kaku, makahikuki ku dadawaay tu makasilamalay.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: tayda i kiwkay kisu makabasu u paculil tu kadideng?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: paculil tu kazizeng kaku tayza i kiwkay, paculil tu kazizeng ku caluwayay tu makabasuay.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: u cacakayan micapi' tu luma' namu haw?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: caay kacapi', makautubay kaku tayda/tayza i cacakayan.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: macapi' ku payubinan tu cacudadan haw?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: macapi', culil han katukuh tu.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: macapi' ku kakacawan tu pikanan haw?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: tahkal i pikacawan culil han lima a sasulitan katukuh tu.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: silawad kisu ayza haw?
mahica?
maydih kaku tayza mizizaw i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: sikawaw kaku ayza caay kailuma' cilacila han tu.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: silawad kisu ancila haw? mamin malahuk tayda kaku mikilim i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I'll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: kapah tu, halhalen aku kisu i luma'.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: hani taneng kaku milingiha haw? maydih mikilu kaku.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: hang i! kapah tu.
taneng miliadingu haw?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: la'cus azihen kaku, caay kalisimet ku sulu, haycan.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn't been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: sasing han tu nu maku.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: makai misasing aca.
kukay kuni pazizaw isu i takuwan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: nayi' ku sapabaliw, u canan ku kaydihan nu misu mipalita?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: hani u canan ku kawaw isu masakapah henay?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: u taylin kaku iayaw, nika miales tu kaku ayza.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: misakawaw kisu ayza?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: i cacudadan kaku mikuli.
hani i niyazu' mueneng ku wawa isu haw?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: caay, i tuse mueneng ku wawa nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: tataytay kisu mueneng haw?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: pahabay henay kaku tu wacu atu ayam, u luma' ay aku kuheni.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: pahabay aca kaku tu cacay a nani', caay ka tibahaw izaw/idaw ku aadupan pacabayay.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won't get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: maydih a mipalita kaku i tisuwan tu nu miadupay a lisin.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: caay ka tineng aku, nika katinengan aku hamin han aku patubeli kisu.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don't know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: u sapiadup namu idaw/izaw ku lisin haw?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: u sapiadup niyam la'cus ku tatayna mitiyung.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: taneng ku tatayna miladay tayza/tayda miadup haw?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: la'cus ku tatayna tayza miadup.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Kumud, nayi' tu ku epah i luma', katayda micakay tu epah kisu.
S.TRANSL: Kumud，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Kumud, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: idaw henay i palud ku cacay, sapica micakay!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: caay kataneng ku cacayay, picakay aca tusaen a langdaway taluma'.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: micakay tu epah kaku, idaw ku nipacakay namu haw?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: idaw tu! hacica ku nipicakay isu saw?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: tusa a langdaway ku nicakay aku, micakay aca tu cacay tabu nu belac.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: iniw ku belac, maydih henay tu canan kisu saw?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: a micakay henay kaku tu ti'kuk, idaw/izaw haw ku nu namu?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: mamin tu mapacakay ku ti'kuk niyam.
a micakay tu zikuc kaku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: u mahicaay ku kaydihan isu?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: u apuyu'ay a ledung a zikuc/dikuc ku cakayen aku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: mahica kuyni sumanahay?
izaw ku dumaay a kulit haw?
izaw henay ku salengacay atu sumilaway niyam.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: pabelien kaku tu cacay sumilaway a zikuc.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Kuli tacuwa kisu nasawni? miwatawat kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: Kuli你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Kuli, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: caay, tayza mipadang ci bai'an aku pacakay tu lami'.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: mahini sa, silawad kisu ansandeb? mapulunng kita malabi.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: kai', tayda micakay tu zikuc kaku.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: a miladay kaku i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: mahica tu, hani pinaan kina lami' saw?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: cacay balud ku lami' tusa a bataan ku kalisiw.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: kuyni a tubah pina ku kalisiw?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: cacay a daduy ku tubah tulu a bataan ku kalisiw.
pabelien kaku tu tusa balud a lami' atu cacay daduy a tubah.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Talib, katawalan aku ku sapisulit, taneng pacaliw kisu i takuwanan haw?
S.TRANSL: Talib，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Talib, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: nayi' ku nu maku, ni Baluay kuyni.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either. This is Balu's.

S.FORM: taneng pacaliwen henay kaku haw? dadawa kaku panukas i tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: hang, alaen.
kukay, padangen kaku a mikukay ci Baluan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Balu for me.

S.FORM: u canan ku kaydihan?
a panukas kaku tuyni tusaay cudad.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: hang i, idaw hen ku kaydihan?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: maydih henay micaliw tu tuluay a cudad kaku.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: hantu. katineng tulu a demiad panukas han tu.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: caay henay panukas kisu tu sabulic i takuwan.
S.TRANSL: You haven't returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: mapanukas tu aku nacila.
kya caay tu kaadih ku sabulic nu maku.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: sipacaliw tu nu misu ci nabaan.
S.TRANSL: Maybe you lend it to Maduhay.

S.FORM: caay katineng kaku. palitaen aku cinida.
S.TRANSL: I don't know. If so, let me go and ask her first.

S.FORM: pacaliwen aku kisu nu makuay a sabulic.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Lengus, nipacaliw ni Ngayaw i tisuwan kina kabung haw?
S.TRANSL: Lengus, did Ngayaw lend you this coat?

S.FORM: caay, nicakayan ni ina aku pabeli i takuwanan.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: malecad ku kabung isu atu ni Ngayaw.
S.TRANSL: Ngayaw's coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: u lumeni'ay ku kabung nida, caay kalecad ku kulit niyam.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Panay, na micaliw kisu tu kalisiw ci Kacawan haw?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did you borrow money from Kacaw?

S.FORM: idaw, a panukas kaku ayda a demiad cinidaan, katawalan aku ku kalisiw.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: ayaan tu kisu panukas?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: ancila panukas han tu nu maku cinidaan.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: hang i, sakamu han tu nu maku ci Kacaw.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Kacaw for you.

S.FORM: ka u ba'tuay a sapibihkac tu edu, ka u bihkac ku nu tuluk, mahini kya malucek.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: mahiniay saca, mapatelac tu kaku, alaci' caay pakazakep kaku.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that's why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: a pasubana'en aca aku kisu hicaen misanga' ku tusaay lamangan a bihkac.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: hang i, u matinengay tu ! mahini anuayaw a makala tu aadupan kaku.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: tanaya' tu ku lutuk nu umahay, kapiala tu kakawit i sulu kisu, taumah kita.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let's go to the fields.

S.FORM: i cuwa mapazeng ya kakawit?
i tapiingan nu biluwa, cumud han i sulu maazih tu isu.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: pihaymaw miala, amana kaduka masinang ku kakawit.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don't get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: amana piemek tu bihkac aku!
i cuwa ku bihkac isu?
i sasa' uyza a kilang ku bihkac aku.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: kya matineng kisu?
pabacuen nu maku i tini, matineng kaku i cuwaay ku bihkac aku.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: u pubu kuyni, pazengen niyam i tapiingan nu sauwac sapibuting.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: nayi' ku pubu niyam i tiza, u sapacemud ku pibuting niyam.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don't have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: caay henay pacemud kaku, anu ayaw pasubana' han tu isu kaku?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: hang i! maladay kita pacemud.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let's go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: pasubana' han tu aku kisu misanga' tu pubu.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: musaungay tu ku sapacemud isu, hakya mukabit tu ku buting, kabilil kisu tengtengen.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn't the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: a sawni tu, mahuyahuy tatu ku balunga. i tini kaku mutengteng tu sapacemud, kaitida kisu miedap muwala tu salil aku.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: tengtengen isu patayni i takuwan kya buting. padangen aku kisu mutengteng.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: kapahay tu! yadah ku nikala ayza, matumes ku biluwa.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: kalamkamen ita taluma' paanin tu katuuday.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let's go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: iniw tu ku saydan.
amana tu pibalakas, kabili mu'neng i puenengan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: ahicanaca, mautang tu kaku!
kapicumud.
sakapina a demiad ayza?
sakalima demiad nu lipay ayza, mihibang anucila, maladay tahkal midang!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!

S.FORM: hang i! tayza i sa'wac kita.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let's go to the riverside.

S.FORM: sakapina a demiad anucila?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: sakatulu demiad nu lipay anucila, anucila namalahuk tayza mibalakas tu mali kita!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let's go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: anucila sananal amihica kisu?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: u pilipayan anucila, madih tayza i kiwkay kaku atu ina.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: mahica tu kisu?
maydih mauta' kaku, maydih tayza i tatai'an.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: masinawal ku tangah aku.
hinaba pahanhan kisu.
saydan, adada' ku bili aku, maydih tayza i tatai'an.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: hang, kalamkamen tayza.
kapah tayza mibanaw tu lima kaku haw?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: apahanhan tu, asawni tu tayza.
S.TRANSL: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: saydan, adada' ku tangah aku, namalahuk amihibang.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: hang, pihaymawi taluma'.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: saydan anuayaw sakacacay demiad nu lipay amihibang kaku, atayza papiazih tu misaydan kaku.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: hang, sakapahen ku uzip.
icuwa ci Sabak?
adada' ku bili niza, i tatai'an ciniza.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She's in the restroom.

S.FORM: icuwa ci Ateng?
saydan, adada' ku takulaw ni Ateng, mihibang ayza.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Ateng has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: mahica caay katayni ci Lisin?
malalisan tu ciniza.
sakamuen cima kisu.
ci Ba'tu Kilang kaku, cacay a bataan ku mihcaan aku ayza.
S.TRANSL: My name is Ba'tu Kilang, and I'm 10 years old.

S.FORM: cima ku ngangan nu misu?
ci Paca' Aki kaku.
cuwaanay a binacadan kisu?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: u wawa nu Sakizaya kaku.
luma'ay nu misu hatu u Yincumin haw?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: hang, hatu u Sakizaya ku luma'ay niyam.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是撒奇萊雅族人。
Yes, my whole family is Sakizaya.

S.FORM: luma'ay nu misu hatu u Yincumin haw?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: cayay, u Sakizaya ku wama aku, u Layak ku wina aku.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是撒奇萊雅族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Sakizaya, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: nima a wawa kisu?
ni Buting Taytu a wawa kaku.
u wama isu kuyza haw? pina tu ku mihcaan niza?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: enem a bataan tu ciniza.
u wama isu kuyza haw? pina tu ku mihcaan niza?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: cayay, u niyazu'ay a kalas niyam ciniza, walu a bataan tu ku mihcaan niza.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pina tu ku mihcaan ni kakama isu?
sabaw walu tu ku mihcaan nu kakama aku.
mihcaan ni kakama isu pina ku pikakaan tisuwan saw?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: lima a mihcaan ku laed niyam.
hacica ku talakaw nu misu?
cacay a lasubu izaw ku sepat a bataan hunan kaku.
matenes tu caay kasasuazih, talakaw tu kisu?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven't seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: hang, cacay a lasubu izaw ku tulu a bataan hunan tu kaku.
kizemu tu kisu?
cuwa, patelac ku niazih isu.
makudus tu kisu haw?
cayay, kizemu tu kaku.
kizemu tu kisu haw?
hang, tulu a bataan daduy tu kaku ayza.
atacuwa kisu?
atayza pisakakawaan mikilim tu saydan kaku.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: atacuwa ci Namuh?
atayza mibakah tu tatuni' ciniza.
S.TRANSL: He's going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: icuwa ci Kuli?
i pingaduyan ciniza, amadademec mingaduy asawni ciniza.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He's at the swimming pool. He's going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: icuwa ci Tupus? amadademec maduba' asawni ciniza.
S.TRANSL: Tupus在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Tupus? She's going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: i litang ciniza, awawen aku ciniza.
S.TRANSL: She's in the auditorium. I'll go call her.

S.FORM: maladay tayza kadubaan.
S.TRANSL: Let's go to the playground together.

S.FORM: ayaw micakay tu sakalahuk kaku, asawni tu tayza mikilim tisuwan.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I'll go buy lunch first, and then I'll meet you later.

S.FORM: maladay mililid tu tabu!
S.TRANSL: Let's carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: pikilim tu tau kisu, atayza mikilim tu saydan kaku.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I'm going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: ayza a demiad amadademec tu cuyciw ci Akih haw?
S.TRANSL: Is Akih competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: caay, amadademec tu mihatebuday ciniza.
S.TRANSL: No, he's competing in high jump.

S.FORM: piunnukayan a demiad amadademec kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: hang, amadadebec maduba' kaku.
piunnukayan a demiad amadademec kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: amadademec tu cuyciw kaku.
piunnukayan a demiad amihica kita.
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: amadademec matatengteng kita.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: piunnukayan apacakay tu kakanan kita haw?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: caay, apacakay tu besu kita.
pakaala tu icibang kisu, u mati:nengay!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You're amazing!

S.FORM: kukay.
i luma' cibai haw?
iniw tu, i kakabian mabi' ciniza.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she's sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: i luma' cibai haw?
nayay, tahkal tu nasawni ciniza, asandeb kya taluma'.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she's not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: i luma' ci baki haw?
i sakatusa ciniza, katayza i pabaw kisu mikilim cinizaan.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He's upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: izaw ku i lima'ay haw?
ci Namuh, matenes caay tu kaazih kisu, kapah tu kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: 是Kacaw阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It's Namuh. I haven't seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: kapah tu! tayni mikilim malpadang tisuwan kaku.
S.TRANSL: I'm doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: icuwan ci ama isu?
i palud miciyan tu lami', awawen aku ciniza.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He's in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: tacuwa tu ci Lami'?
tayza i palubuan mizakep tu tulakuk ciniza.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: baki, iniwtu kami.
caay ka i luma' ku baki namu, i umah ciniza, i luma' kamu mihalhal cinizaan taluma'.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He's in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: tayni kisu sinaama!
matenes caay kaazih, talakaw tu kisu.
S.TRANSL: I haven't seen you in a while. You've grown taller.

S.FORM: manamuh makaazih katayni isu.
S.TRANSL: It's so good to see you.

S.FORM: u sapabeli tamuwan kuyni a padingan, a pazengen i pingsyang.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here's a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: matenes caay katayni, awawen aku ku katuuday mapulung mukan.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It's been a while. Let's have a meal together.

S.FORM: sapica kalibutan tu, ucya ku nanumen aku, tayni i tumunaw malpadang kita.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I'll just have tea. Let's sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: kukay tu pahalhal nu misu, ataluma' tu kaku.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: nasawni nipacukan kuyni tulakuk, pataluma'en haymaw han mukan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: nakamuan nu misu atu aku anucila namalahuk kapah tu haw?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: kapah tu, nakamuan nu mita icuwa masasuazih?
nakamuan nu mita cacudadan kapah tu haw? amisasing kita.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: tayza pakayingan kapah tu, asilusid kaku tayza.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let's go to the community center. I'll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: niyazu'ay niyam a sakulal salungan ku bitelak. halhal tu bitelak nu balu katayni mikilim takuwan!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: halhal katukuh tu sadingsingan, mautang tu!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It's too late, isn't it?

S.FORM: katayni pipalamalan kisu!
S.TRANSL: 那你豐年祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: hang i! halhalen aku!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I'm looking forward to it!

S.FORM: hani kya malimad taluma' i niyazu' mauzip kisu?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: ataluma' pasubana' tu cudad kaku.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: mahica caay ka i tukay pasubana' tu cudad?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: zayhan mabulah kaku tu niyazu' aku, maydih aca pasukas tu niyazu'ay.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: matineng mitenun kisu, cima ku pasubana'ay tisuwan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You're very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: u bai aku, u samatinengay mitenun a tademaw nu niyazu' niyam ciniza.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: kya maydih minanam mitenun kisu?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: u lalangawan nu niyam ku mitenun, maydih a panayat tu lalangawan kaku.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: asu' kanen kuyni a elaw.
nu maku nisaelawan yu!
mati:neng kisu, matenes misaelaw tuyni haw?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You're really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: caay, pakala tu cacay a lipay kapah tu. ayawen mihudhud mingaay ku belac atu hakhak, palamel han tu sapakulit papulung han mikiwakiw palalecad, pazeng han tu i labu nu tedus kapah tu.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: canan ku nipacakay isu?
izaw itini ku nu maku dukiyu atu daydam, hatu nipalumaan nu maku!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: hamin tusa kunicakay pina ku kalisiw?
mapulung tusa a lasubu izaw ku lima a bataan ku kalisiw.
manamuh tuyni a zikuc kaku, pina ku kalisiw?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: lima a lasubu ku kalisiw nuyni.
matekes tatu, la'tus saadidi'en haw?
S.TRANSL: It's too expensive. Can't you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: amana' saadidi'en masipun kaku.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I'll lose money.

S.FORM: hang i, uyza lumeni'ay a zikuc ku kaydihan aku.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I'll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: uyni siuy atu uyni bakan ku kaydihan aku.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: pulung tusa a malebut ku kalisiw, uyni nalimaan nisanga'an nu maku, tatenga' matenes miyung.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It's a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: siwkayen aku ku cabay tayni micakay, kapah ahemi'en tuatudi' haw?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I'll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: hang! padangen kisu mipica' tu walu.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I'll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: awza azihazihen! izaw amin ku nipacakay tu tupel zikuc.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: hani pina ku kalisiw nu zikuc?
tulu a lasubu izaw ku lima a bataan ku kalisiw nu cacay a zikuc. cacay a malebut ku kalisiw nu tuluay a zikuc.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: cacay ku nicakay aku kapah tu, pabelien kaku tu baluhay.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I'll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: mahica tu, maydih kaku micakay tu hakhak atu makaw silaw.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: mamin tu mapacakay ku hemay. izaw henay ku tana' tinpula aku, maydih micakay kisu haw?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: hang i! pabelien kaku tu cacay, anuayaw tayni tu kaku micakay.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I'll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: hang, padangen aku kisu mipazeng i alubu, mahini lima a bataan ku kalisiw.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I'll pack it in a bag for you. That'll be 50 dollars.
